summary: A fast test suite for the StableUnCLIP image‑to‑image diffusion pipeline that sets up lightweight dummy components and inputs, then verifies core functionalities such as attention slicing, handling of absent image embeddings, batch inference consistency, and xformers‑based attention execution.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and performance of the StableUnCLIP img2img pipeline to guarantee reliable generation, efficient memory usage, and proper integration of advanced attention optimizations before deployment.
